Articles.Content:
Well after tweaking, and tweaking, finally i got it to fly, and man can it fly!

The correct angle for re-entry, anything else just looks stupid. it is basically a bullet upon reentry until about 2000m then you have to kick in the hover engines, nose up, full throttle to slow it down. am thinking of installing braking thrusters

eventually i will get the apc loaded into it, and get an internal done on both, then it will be user ready.

Corporal Vasquez

USCSM/KSCSM 8thBMTS Sulaco
